mapper.select: select * from member where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.insert: insert into member( id, pw, email, address, phone )values( #{id}, #{pw}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone} )
mapper.update: update member set pw = #{pw}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, phone = #{phone} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select boardreply.no as reply_no, board.title, board.no, boardreply.isalert, boardreply.writer from board left outer join boardreply on boardreply.board_no = (select no from board where writer=#{wrtier})
mapper.update: update boardreply set isalert = true where no = #{reply_no}
